mysteries.title: Bhoddvea Gabrielan Ankvar Mariek khobor dili, Devacho Putr tiche kuxint ietolo mohnn, ani Povitr Atmeache kurpen ti gorbest zali.
Ankvar Maria gorbest astanan Santa Izabel aple mauxe-bhoinnink bhett korunk geli ani tiche thaim tin mhoine tiche sevek ravli.
Ankvar Maria Ballka Jezuk porsut zali Belea xarant, gorvanchea gottheant, monzatim modem.
Ankvar Marien Ballka Jezuk bhettoilo Devmondirant ani Taka Sam Simeanvchea hatant dilo.
Porbechea disa sanddlea upran tin disamnim Ballok Jezu Dev-mondirant mell'lo.
Jezun Jordan nodint Povitr Snan ghetlem an1 Sorginchea Bapan Putak vakhannlo.
Kanantlea lognak Somi Jezu ochoriem korun apli ollokh dili.
Jezun Devacheam Raj porgottlem ani apleam xisank Xubhvortoman mandun mon bodlunk xikovnn dili.
Tabor dongrar tegam xisam mukhar Jezu porzollit zalo ani 'tachem aikat' mhonn ek tallo aikunk ailo.
Jezun Aple K uddi-Rogtacho Povitr Sonvskar ghoddunk amche modhem ravlo ani to aplea ugddasak korunk lailo.
Somi Jezu Krist, Getsemanichea moleant magnnem kortanam, amcheam patkam pasot rogot humelo.
Pilatachea raz-agnnant,Somia Jezu Kristak eka khambeak bandlo ani vhodde nixturaien, Tachi povitr kudd jerbondamnim fafxili.
Somi Jezu Kristachea mostokar, team nixttur Judevamnim ek kantteeancho mukutt bosoilo.
Somi Jezu Krist, Aplea khandar to bharadik khuris gheun Kalvar dongrachi vatt tankta .
Amchea Somiak sobhe mazar ani Ankvar Marieche dixtti mukhar vingllo korun dogma choram modem khursar zoddlo.
Somi Jezu Krist Aplech podven, tisrea disa, mel'leantlo jivont zalo.
Somi Jezu Kristjivont zatoch challis disamni porzollit zaun sorgar choddlo.
Somi Jezu Krist sorgar vetoch, patthoilo Povitr Atmeak Jevnna vosreant zhoim Ankvar Mari ani Prexit aslint.
Somia Jezuchea mornna uprant, Ankvar Mari sabar vorsamni sorgar geli.
Povitr Tritven Ankvar Mariechea mostokar mukutt ghalo ani tika sorga ani sonvsarachi Ranni keli.
